title: Aston Villa 1-3 Newcastle: Sandro Tonali scores twice in fine fightback
desc: Sandro Tonali scores twice as Newcastle United overcame a series of controversial decisions from the officials to knock 10-man Aston Villa out of the FA Cup.

title: Scotland 31-20 England: Six Nations Murrayfield player ratings
desc: Kyle Steyn and Finn Russell were irrepressible for the hosts while Ollie Chessum shone for England but Ollie Ford was among those in white who had days to forget

title: OPP investigate fatal crash on Hwy. 407 at Hwy. 404 in Markham
desc: The Ontario Provincial Police (OPP) says some ramps between Highway 407 and Highway 404 have closed due to a serious two-vehicle collision.

title: In Munich, Europe Says It Is ‘De-risking’ From the U.S. Amid Trump’s Unpredictability
desc: In Munich, European leaders were also talking about “de-risking” from the United States, citing President Trump’s unpredictability.

title: The Smartest Growth Stock to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
desc: Making AI data centers perform better is more difficult. The new frontier is the tech that interconnects thousands of processor chips.

title: Wild St John's-Providence brawl ends with six ejections
desc: Saturday’s St John’s-Providence game bout broke into chaos. Early in the second half Saturday, the Red Storm’s Bryce Hopkins went up for a layup on a fast break when the Friars’ Duncan Powell mauled him at the rim, throwing the latter to the floor.

title: Cunha offers brutal thoughts on 'not cool' haircut guy; hails 'beautiful' Carrick impact
desc: Matheus Cunha insists "I don't care at all" about viral Man Utd haircut guy Frank Illet. "We don't see it as cool."

title: US planning for weeks-long Iran operations
desc: The US military is preparing for the possibility of sustained, weeks-long operations against Iran if President Donald Trump orders an attack, two US officials told Reuters, in what could become a far more serious conflict than ⁠previously seen between the countries.

title: Former President Barack Obama speaks out on ICE shootings in Minnesota: "This is not the America we believe in"
desc: President Obama spoke about the "unprecedented nature" of what he said Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents did in Minnesota.

title: ACT Brumbies defeat Western Force 56
desc: The ACT Brumbies have turned up the heat to blitz the Western Force 56-24 in a sapping season-opening Super Rugby Pacific clash in Perth.
